channel.title: symbian on Nomad's reflections
channel.description: Recent content in symbian on Nomad's reflections

item.title: Damn Symbian errors!
item.description: Now you never know how will modern technology strike you next time… Experience I’ve got today is remarkable. It’s not that something awful happened, but potentially this is really serious. Imagine you have a template in the phone to send SMS quickly with predefined text. And Imagine this piece of software has bugs… Whatever – one might think if it won’t send an sms – I’ll retype and sent it again.
